meanings.definition: A volcano in eastern Sicily, Italy.
meanings.sent1: Mount Etna is a famous volcano in Italy.
meanings.sent2: People travel from all over to see the majestic Mount Etna.
meanings.sent3: When the volcano Etna sneezes, it covers everything in ash!
meanings.sent4: Her anger erupted like Mount Etna, spewing fiery words.
meanings.sent5: The rumbling of Mount Etna could be heard for miles around.

meanings.sent1: I love to eat Etna pasta with tomato sauce.
meanings.sent2: Have you ever tried Etna pasta with cheese on top?
meanings.sent3: The Etna pasta twirled around the fork like a tornado!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as curly as a plate of Etna pasta.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of Etna pasta cooking filled the kitchen.
